com.nanoxic.nanorpc4j

Class Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nanoxic.nanorpc4j.Account

  • public class Account
extends Object
    Class representing a single Nano account
    Author:
    Koen De Voegt

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Account(String accountKey)
      Construct a detached Account using either an address or a public key.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Account

        public Account(String accountKey)
        Construct a detached Account using either an address or a public key. A detached Account is an Account that is not part of any Wallet, it can be used as a receiver of funds. Use Wallet.getAccount() to get an attached Account.
        Parameters:
        accountKey - An address or an account public key

      • getInfo

        public com.nanoxic.nanorpc4j.AccountInfo getInfo(boolean representative,
                                                 boolean weight,
                                                 boolean pending)
        Returns frontier, open block, change representative block, balance, last modified timestamp from local database & block count for account. Optionally returns representative, voting weight, pending balance for account
        Parameters:
        representative - Include the representative in the AccountInfo object
        weight - Include the weight in the AccountInfo object
        pending - Include the pending in the AccountInfo object
        Returns:
        An AccountInfo object containing the requested information

      • getHistory

        public List<HistoryItem> getHistory(int... count)
        Returns the last count history items for this account, defaults to 5 items
        Parameters:
        count - Either one or no Integer, the amount of history items wanted
        Returns:
        The last 5 history items for this account

      • getRepresentative

        public String getRepresentative()
        Returns the representative for this account
        Returns:
        The representative for this account

      • send

        public String send(Account destinationAccount,
                   NANO amount,
                   String id)
        Send amount from this Account to destination Account. Sending Account must be attached to a Wallet.
        Parameters:
        destinationAccount - The Account to send to
        amount - The amount to send
        id - A unique id for each spend to provide idempotency
        Returns:
        The send block that was generated

      • receive

        public String receive(String block)
        Receive pending block.
        Parameters:
        block - The pending block
        Returns:
        The receive block

      • receive

        public String receive(String block,
                      String work)
        Receive pending block using work from external source.
        Parameters:
        block - The pending block
        work - A work value from an external source
        Returns:
        The receive block
